# Problem

## Spatially explicit models

* Spatially explicit models are often not spatially explicit
* Example:

```{r}
Datos <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/derek-corcoran-barrios/derek-corcoran-barrios.github.io/master/Presentaciones_Espacial/Bombus.csv")

B_impatiens <- Datos[Datos$species == "Bombus impatiens",]
## Miremos los datos
B_impatiens_shp <- terra::vect(B_impatiens)

Climate <- geodata::worldclim_country(country = "United States", var = "bio", res = 0.5, path = getwd())
```
